attributes.action: Give Nigel Farage a Knighood for freeing us from Europe.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage and U.K.I.P. have spent years trying to get us a Leave or Stay vote over Europe. He has never given in nor stopped trying. His only concern has been the British People's freedom to choose and not be dictated to by unelected Eurocrats.

rejection.details:
Please consult the following website for information on how the honours system works:
https://www.gov.uk/honours/
